scripts.deploy: near contract deploy ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet use-file ./build/ormp_aggregator.wasm without-init-call network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.inspect: near contract inspect ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet network-config testnet now
scripts.meta: near contract call-function as-read-only ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet contract_source_metadata json-args {} network-config testnet now
scripts.storage: near contract view-storage ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet all as-json network-config testnet now
scripts.clear: near contract call-function as-transaction ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet _clear_state json-args {} prepaid-gas '100.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.publish-test: near contract call-function as-transaction ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet publish json-args {} prepaid-gas '300.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.publish-external: near contract call-function as-transaction ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet publish_external json-args '{"request_id": "6277101735386680763835789423207666416102355444464034512850"}' prepaid-gas '300.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.report: near contract call-function as-transaction ormpaggregator.guantong.testnet report json-args '{"request_id":"6277101735386680763835789423207666416102355444464034512850","nonce":"1","answers":[{"data_source_name":"test-source","result":"test-result"}],"reporter_required":{"quorum":1,"threshold":1},"reward_address":"reward-address"}' prepaid-gas '300.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
